law.catch_line: Quorum -- Votes for action of board.
law.text: A quorum of the board shall consist of at least six (6) members. The concurring votes of five (5) members shall be considered as the action of the board, except in the case of revoking a certificate, in which case the concurring votes of at least seven (7) members shall be required.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 146, effective July 15, 1998.
